Description: Pendant cross; silver; slightly tapering arms; suspension loop(broken); applied granule at end of each and in centre; applied copper-alloy medallion in form of lozenge, engraved with cross enclosed by lozenge border.
Curator's comments: Parallel: J. Strzygowski, Koptische Kunst (Vienna 1904) cat. 9187.
Condition: Corroded; silver sheet missing or damaged.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev W F Flood
